mapper.select: select iid as "iId",--系统自增加id syh as "Syh",--住院唯一编号 temdate as "TemDate",--测体温日期 temvalue as "TemValue" --体温 from SI_MSTEMPERATUREINFO_ZY a,SI_MSSYINFO_ZY b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.syh=b.syh and a.orgcode =#{map.Hoscode} and b.gendate>=to_char(#{map.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gendate<=to_char(#{map.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
